channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-6753] Flaky SqlITCase
item.description:
Tests run: 11, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 6.674 sec <<< FAILURE! - in org.apache.flink.table.api.scala.stream.sql.SqlITCase
testUnnestArrayOfArrayFromTable(org.apache.flink.table.api.scala.stream.sql.SqlITCase)  Time elapsed: 0.289 sec  <<< ERROR!

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I also had this issue once. But it is hard to reproduce. I will update the Janino version, this might help. At least I could not get the error again on my machine.

GitHub user twalthr opened a pull request:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/4010

FLINK-6753 [table] Fix flaky SqlITCase due to Janino bug

I hope this fixes the flaky test. Otherwise we have to ask the Janino guys about this error.

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

$ git pull https://github.com/twalthr/flink FLINK-6753

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/4010.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

This closes #4010

commit fba92bf91632e33c84393b79e24fba175b47ee03
Author: twalthr <twalthr@apache.org>
Date: 2017-05-29T14:52:19Z

FLINK-6753 [table] Fix flaky SqlITCase due to Janino bug
Can you tell me what you did to get this exception? I can do the same action in my side.

Github user twalthr commented on the issue:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/4010

Merging this...

Github user asfgit closed the pull request at:

https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/4010
